description: This is an __init__.py file for the universalinit_env package, which provides functions for mapping environment variables between frameworks and a common format.

methods.name: get_template_path
methods.description: Retrieves the path to a specified template.

methods.name: parse_template_file
methods.description: Parses a template file for processing.

methods.name: map_common_to_framework
methods.description: Maps environment variables from a common format to a specific framework.

methods.name: map_framework_to_common
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables to a common format.

methods.name: get_supported_frameworks
methods.description: Returns a list of supported frameworks.

methods.name: apply_wildcard_mapping
methods.description: Applies wildcard mappings to environment variables.
